name: Smile at Death
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return up to two target creature cards with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures.
flavor_text:
"Khan Alesha ensured our survival. Now we will forge our future."
—Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

name: Nature's Rhythm
oracle_text:
Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Harmonize {X}{G}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its harmonize cost. You may tap a creature you control to reduce that cost by an amount of generic mana equal to its power. Then exile this spell.)

name: Eshki Dragonclaw
oracle_text:
Vigilance, trample, ward {1}
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've cast both a creature spell and a noncreature spell this turn, draw a card and put two +1/+1 counters on Eshki Dragonclaw.
flavor_text: "The Twice Whisperer heals. The Dragonclaw protects. Together, we will rebuild the Temur."

name: Narset, Jeskai Waymaster
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw cards equal to the number of spells you've cast this turn.
flavor_text: "Each step we take is a decision that changes the course of our futures. We must be careful where we tread."

name: Felothar, Dawn of the Abzan
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever Felothar enters or attacks, you may sacrifice a nonland permanent. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
flavor_text: "Through perennation, we stand together, families—ancestor and kin─united as one clan! Abzan!"

name: Fangkeeper's Familiar
oracle_text:
Flash

• You gain 3 life and surveil 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Counter target creature spell.

This land enters tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.

name: Call the Spirit Dragons
oracle_text:
Dragons you control have indestructible.

oracle_text: During your turn, spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.
